text: Most men, when they think they are thinking, are merely rearranging their prejudices.
author: Knute Rockne

text: One must judge men not by their opinions, but by what their opinions have made of them.
author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

text: He was one of those men who possess almost every gift, except the gift of the power to use them.
author: Charles Kingsley

text: Circumstances rule men men do not rule circumstances.
author: Herodotus

text: Men, as well as women, are much oftener led by their hearts than by their understandings.
author: Lord Chesterfield
